introduction.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Ekakshar Real Estate Developers! Your privacy is important to us.
introduction.overview: This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, how we use it, and your rights. By using our website, you agree to the practices described here.

informationCollection.description: At Ekakshar Real Estate, we collect different types of information to provide the best services as a real estate developer and broker.

dataTypes.details: We may collect your name, email address, phone number, and other details when you contact us about properties, subscribe to our updates, or create an account on our website.
We gather information on your property preferences, budget, and financial details to match you with the best real estate options.
When you visit ekaksharbuildtech.in, we collect your IP address, browser type, and browsing behavior to improve your experience on our site.
We may store and review your communications, such as email inquiries, for quality and support purposes.

dataUsage.purpose: Our primary purpose in collecting your information is to enhance your real estate experience.

uses.details: We use your data to respond to inquiries, process applications, and tailor our property recommendations based on your preferences.
With your consent, we may send you property listings, real estate news, or promotional offers relevant to your interests.
We use your data to comply with applicable real estate regulations and ensure compliance with legal obligations.
We process payments and communicate with you about any financial matters related to property transactions.
Data on your site usage helps us optimize ekaksharbuildtech.in and provide a smooth browsing experience.

dataSharingAndDisclosure.commitment: We are committed to protecting your data and will not sell or trade your information.

sharedWith.details: We partner with website hosting, payment processors, and marketing platforms to provide efficient service. These providers have limited access to your data solely to perform tasks on our behalf.
If required, we may disclose information to comply with legal obligations, such as a court order or government inquiry.
In the event of a business transition, such as a merger or acquisition, your information may be transferred to the successor entity.

securityMeasures.commitment: We take security seriously at Ekakshar Real Estate. We implement the following measures to protect your data.

measures.details: Sensitive data, including financial details, is encrypted to safeguard your information during transmission.
Access to personal data is restricted to authorized personnel only.
We frequently monitor and update our systems to prevent unauthorized access and maintain data security.

dataRetention.policy: We retain your personal data as long as necessary to provide our services, fulfill legal requirements, and support our business operations.
dataRetention.dataDeletion: You may request data deletion where permitted by law.

cookiesAndTracking.description: Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience. Cookies collect data on your preferences and help us serve you relevant content.
cookiesAndTracking.management: You can manage cookie settings via your browser, although disabling cookies may impact site functionality.

cookieTypes.details: Provide insight into how users interact with our site.
